text: Space Cowboys is a 2000 American adventure drama movie directed and produced by Clint Eastwood. It stars Eastwood, Tommy Lee Jones, Donald Sutherland, and James Garner as four older "ex-test pilots" who are sent into space to fix an old Soviet satellite. The movie also stars James Cromwell and Marcia Gay Harden. The movie was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Sound Editing in 2001. ==References== Category:2000 adventure movies Category:2000 drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood
title: Space Cowboys
